attributes.action: Depot military to return and control migrants , deploy navy to turn back boats
attributes.additional_details: This will be a positive step, popular with a majority of the electorate
attributes.background: Action above proposal to control illegal migration into the UK

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
